name: SUPERSHOD HD
description:
An unlikely hero returns to join forces against the danger.

Time moves only when he moves, but the villain is super strong this time. He needs help.

HD remake of last year's hit SUPERSHOD, with premiere local co-op game mode!

Team: Holy Pangolin's Holistic Game Studio: Agata Nawrot and Sebastian Krzyszkowiak, plus lots of other jammers!

Make sure to watch the trailer!
